author: monkeyontheloose.eth
content: cool, another Q: is there a specific reason why the block gas limit converges to 30M?

author: sky.cactus
content: Do you mean why 30M instead of 31M?  Or do you mean why does it converge on a particular number?

author: sky.cactus
content: The mechanism for it converging can be seen in https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1559.  As to why 30M, that is basically an arbitrary number that "felt right" to some unknown group of people in the past and these things are sticky.  I personally think 30M is way too high given that we haven't solved the state growth problem yet.

author: monkeyontheloose.eth
content: where does it explain the convergence?

author: monkeyontheloose.eth
content: you just want to see high txn fees haha

author: sky.cactus
content: Fees adjust up if the gas used is over 15M, fees adjust down if it is below 15M.
